name: !Khwa (Water Bull)
shortLoreBlurb: !Khwa (Water Bull) is a creature/spirit from San associated with river monster, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.

description: !Khwa (Water Bull) is a creature/spirit from San associated with river monster, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
